question: Cardinals vs. Guardians
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for June 29 at 12:05PM ET:
If the St. Louis Cardinals win, the market will resolve to “Cardinals”.
If the Cleveland Guardians win, the market will resolve to “Guardians”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
To know when a postponed game will be played, please check the home team's schedule on MLB.com for the listed team and look for the game described as a makeup game.

question: Will Ace Bailey play in the Jazz Summer League?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Ace Bailey plays in any of the Utah Jazz’s Summer League games for the 2025 NBA Summer League. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If Bailey is cut, traded, retires, or is otherwise officially ruled out for the game, this market will resolve to "No".

"Playing" is defined as Ace Bailey playing at least 1 second in the game. Merely being on the game-day roster will not qualify for a "Yes" resolution.

The resolution source for this market will be information from the NBA.

events.title: Will Ace Bailey play in the Jazz Summer League?
events.description:

question: Ace Bailey traded before August?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Ace Bailey of the Utah Jazz is traded to another team by July 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If Bailey is cut, retires, or is not on an NBA roster as of the resolution date this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the Utah Jazz, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Ace Bailey traded before August?
events.description:

question: MSI Play-in: G2 vs. Bilibili Gaming
description:
G2 Esports and Bilibili Gaming are scheduled to play each other in the play-in of the Mid-Season Invitational on June 28 2025, at 8:00 PM ET.

This market will resolve to “G2” if G2 wins against Bilibili Gaming in the best of 5, play-in matchup of the Mid-Season Invitational.

This market will resolve to “Bilibili Gaming” if Bilibili Gaming wins against G2 in the best of 5, play-in matchup of the Mid-Season Invitational.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond June 30, 2025, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from LoL Esports (https://lolesports.com/en-GB/tournament/113470835034591734/overview).

question: Will the price of Bitcoin be less than $106K on June 29 at 5PM ET?
description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.
